SELECT CONTENTS.cnt, CONTENTS.script_uid, CONTENTS.category_code, CASE CONTENTS.fid -- 은행 WHEN 'BDPC04010101' THEN '1' WHEN 'BDPC04010201' THEN '2' -- 카드 WHEN 'BDPC04020101' THEN '1' WHEN 'BDPC04020201' THEN '2' -- 금투 WHEN 'BDPC04030101' THEN '1' WHEN 'BDPC04030201' THEN '4' WHEN 'BDPC04030301' THEN '5' -- 생명 WHEN 'BDPC04040101' THEN '1' WHEN 'BDPC04040201' THEN '6' WHEN 'BDPC04040401' THEN '7' -- 건강브리핑 WHEN 'BDPC04040501' THEN '8' -- 질병브리핑 END cId, CONTENTS.script_title, CONTENTS.script_weight, CONTENTS.script_rank, CONTENTS.update_date, CONTENTS.script_date, CONTENTS.script_label_l1, CONTENTS.script_label_l2, CONTENTS.script_label_l3, CONTENTS.script_label_l4 FROM (SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY a.fid)) cnt, a.script_uid, a.fid, a.category_code, a.business_code, a.script_title, a.script_weight, a.script_rank, a.update_date, a.script_date, a.script_label_l1, a.script_label_l2, a.script_label_l3, a.script_label_l4 FROM (SELECT std.script_uid, std.fid, std.category_code, std.business_code, std.script_title, std.script_weight, std.script_rank, std.update_date, std.script_date, std.script_label_l1, std.script_label_l2, std.script_label_l3, std.script_label_l4
FROM dm.script_rel_docs_std_info std
AND TO_CHAR(std.script_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{param.date} AND LEFT(std.category_code, 5) = #{param.categoryCode} AND std.business_code = #{param.businessCode} AND std.job_id = #{param.jobId}
AND std.fid = #{param.fid}
ORDER BY std.script_date DESC,
std.script_rank ASC, std.script_title ASC ) a ) CONTENTS
AND cnt <= #{param.cnt}::integer

SELECT DISTINCT docs.rel_doc_title script_title , summary.script_date , docs.rel_doc_uid , summary.sum_rate , summary.rel_doc_summary FROM dm.stock_market_top_rel_docs docs INNER JOIN dm.script_rel_docs_summary_extractive summary ON docs.rel_doc_uid = summary.rel_doc_uid
AND docs.isu_dcs_date = #{param.date}::DATE AND docs.isu_cd = #{param.scriptUid} AND docs.fid = #{param.fid}
ORDER BY summary.script_date DESC, summary.sum_rate ASC
LIMIT #{param.cnt}::INTEGER

SELECT * FROM (SELECT row_number() over(partition BY isu_dcs_date ORDER BY mn_rank ASC, mn_cnt DESC) cnt , isu_cd script_uid , null category_code , 5 cid , isu_nm script_title , mn_cnt script_weight , mn_rank script_rank , isu_dcs_date script_date , '' script_label_l1 , '' script_label_l2 , '' script_label_l3 , '' script_label_l4 FROM dm.stock_market_top
AND fid = #{param.fid} AND isu_dcs_date = #{param.date}::DATE
) RESULT
AND cnt <= #{param.cnt}::integer
